stacked-bar-and-lines-chart-card.NAME: Stacked Bar and Lines Chart
stacked-bar-and-lines-chart-card.DESCRIPTION: Display data as stacked bars with additional line series

VALIDATION.REQUIRED_BAR_SERIES: At least one bar series is required
VALIDATION.REQUIRED_BAR_SERIES_COLUMN: Bar series data column is required
VALIDATION.INVALID_BAR_WIDTH: Bar width must be between 0 and 100
VALIDATION.REQUIRED_LINE_SERIES_COLUMN: Line series data column is required
VALIDATION.INVALID_SYMBOL_SIZE: Symbol size must be between 1 and 20
VALIDATION.INVALID_AREA_OPACITY: Area opacity must be between 0 and 1
